medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive exertional dyspnea and left-sided chest pain for 6 months.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 6 months prior to admission, with progressive exertional dyspnea and left-sided chest pain. The intensity of dyspnea increased over time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous blunt chest trauma from a road accident 10 years ago, complete recovery after 5 days of hospitalization.
